name: Delete Volume Shadow Copies via WMI with PowerShell
description: Deletes Windows Volume Shadow Copies with PowerShell code and Get-WMIObject. This technique is used by numerous ransomware families such as Sodinokibi/REvil
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*Get\-WmiObject* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*Win32_Shadowcopy* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.Delete\(\)*)`
